5802.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|173|96$ٱلنُّجُومُ|the stars|84|260|17711$ٱنكَدَرَتْ|fall, losing their luster|163|251|17893$

5804.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|151|96$ٱلْعِشَارُ|the full-term she-camels|183|315|17894$عُطِّلَتْ|(are) left untended;|153|219|17895$

5806.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|173|96$ٱلْبِحَارُ|the seas|82|258|17898$سُجِّرَتْ|are made to overflow,|166|254|17899$

5808.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|163|96$ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ|the female infant buried alive|213|369|17902$سُئِلَتْ|is asked|75|153|17903$

5815.verse: فَلَآ|But nay!|76|161|208$أُقْسِمُ|I swear|69|238|16602$بِٱلْخُنَّسِ|by the retreating planets,|191|276|17913$

5819.verse: إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, it|84|126|396$لَقَوْلُ|(is) surely a word|136|221|17286$رَسُولٍ|(of) a Messenger|133|218|9517$كَرِيمٍ|noble,|68|110|12877$

5820.verse: ذِى قُوَّةٍ|Possessor of power,|153|186|17917$عِندَ|with|56|122|521$ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ|(the) Owner of the Throne|197|263|17918$مَكِينٍ|secure,|71|104|12225$

5823.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|154|640$رَءَاهُ|he saw him|94|187|13209$بِٱلْأُفُقِ|in the horizon|110|203|16246$ٱلْمُبِينِ|the clear.|84|131|8796$

5801.verse: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

5802.verse: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

5803.verse: And when the mountains are removed

5804.verse: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

5805.verse: And when the wild beasts are gathered

5806.verse: And when the seas are filled with flame

5807.verse: And when the souls are paired

5808.verse: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

5809.verse: For what sin she was killed

5810.verse: And when the pages are made public

5811.verse: And when the sky is stripped away

5812.verse: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

5813.verse: And when Paradise is brought near,

5814.verse: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

5815.verse: So I swear by the retreating stars -

5816.verse: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -

5817.verse: And by the night as it closes in

5818.verse: And by the dawn when it breathes

5819.verse: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

5820.verse: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

5821.verse: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

5822.verse: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

5823.verse: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.

5824.verse: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

5825.verse: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

5827.verse: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

5828.verse: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

5829.verse: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
